item.description: Off leash dogs are allowed on the trails at this park, but you must pick up! Run through the fields or walk through the wooded trails up to Puffer's Pond along a section of the Robert Frost Trail. Come join us for some fresh air and playtime! Lots of good doggie swimming spots here. Kristi's cell is 413-695-9848 if all else fails. -- Kristi
item.how_to_find_us: I have a black lab w/blue leash, & vanilla PT Cruiser

group.name: Western Mass Dogs - Walks and more!

item.name: Walk by the Mill River, North Amherst
